title: The Good the Bad and the Ugly - Multi Audio&Subs
description:
The Good The Bad and The Ugly (1966)



This is the 2 x Disc Special Edition



The feature film has been remastered both the Graphics and Audio 

It has also been re-cut and restored to its original length of 171 minutes




Audio: English / German / French / All 5.1



Subtitles: Croatian / Czech / Danish / Dutch / Finnish / French / Greek / Hebrew / Norwegian / Polish / Portuguese / Romanian / Slovenian  / Swedish / Turkish



Subtitles for the Hearing Impaired: English / German



PAL



********************************************************************************


Special Edition Features


Audio Commentary with Richard Schickel

Documentary "Leone's West"

Documentary "The Leone Style"

Restoring The Good The Bad and the Ugly featurette

"The Socorro Sequence: "A Reconstruction" - Animated Gallery of Missing Sequences

Extended Tuco Torture Scene

"Il Maestro" featurette

"Il Maestro part 2" Audio featurette

French Trailer

Poster Gallery


*********************************************************************************



1539 x 8MB packets 

Initial Seeding Process Used (This means the quicker you upload the 8MB I send to you the faster you get another one from me.)



A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.



 ***** As Always, My Thanks in advance to those who stay on to seed after their download has been completed it is much appreciated *****
